programme.title: CNY - Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: Impressive culinary skills take center stage as the chef showcases refined techniques, blending fruit carving with creative festive dishes to express wishes of abundance and happiness. With vibrant colors, rich aromas, and delicious flavors, these creations not only symbolize prosperity but also bring joyful New Year spirit to the table.

programme.title: Mr.Player - 11
programme.desc: To mark its anniversary, Mr Player travels to Canada for a special overseas edition. Hosts and celebrity guests team up for large-scale outdoor missions, international challenges, and Taiwanese-themed cooking battles, delivering excitement, laughter, and unforgettable moments of teamwork and adventure.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: CNY - Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: The New Year cooking workshop of Stylish Man-The Chef returns with easy and practical tips for preparing festive dishes at home. With simple yet impressive ideas perfect for the holiday table, this episode brings fresh inspiration to make New Year meals richer and more creative.

programme.title: CNY - Pro on their Speciality
programme.desc: This educational documentary explores business stories across Taiwan. In this episode, it celebrates the Lantern Festival, also known as the Little New Year, featuring the thrilling Yanshui Beehive Fireworks in Tainan, Lantern Festival traditions such as Qigu turtle offerings at a long-established pastry shop in Taipei, and vocational training in correctional facilities that helps individuals rebuild skills, dignity, and hope for reintegration into society.

programme.title: CNY - Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: The Lunar New Year cooking workshop of Stylish Man-The Chef kicks off with lively energy as two master chefs join forces to demonstrate practical festive dishes. Bringing fresh twists to traditional New Year favorites, the episode offers easy-to-follow inspiration that adds surprise and creativity to the holiday table.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Mr.Player - 11
programme.desc: To mark its anniversary, Mr Player travels to Canada for a special overseas edition. Hosts and celebrity guests team up for large-scale outdoor missions, international challenges, and Taiwanese-themed cooking battles, delivering excitement, laughter, and unforgettable moments of teamwork and adventure.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Ne Zha 2
programme.desc: After surviving the Heavenly Lightning Strike, the souls of Ne Zha and Ao Bing persist, but their mortal forms lie in ruins. Master Tai Yi seeks to restore them using the Seven-Colored Lotus, yet countless perils loom over the process. As enemies close in and fate hangs in the balance, can they reclaim their bodies and rewrite their destiny?

programme.title: Forbidden City Cop
programme.desc: A wild and hilariously anachronistic tale of an imperial guard of the Forbidden City who has no martial arts abilities. When the emperor is abducted, he saved the day with his unusual hobby: tinkering with futuristic inventions!

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 1900
programme.desc: In 1900s San Francisco, a white woman is murdered in Chinatown, and a Chinese man becomes the prime suspect. The crime sparks public outcry to shut down the district. Amid growing unrest, two Chinese detectives, Qin Fu and Ah Gui, race against time to uncover the true killer before prejudice and danger consume their community.

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: After legendary kung fu star Jackie Chan adopts the panda Hu Hu, an international crime syndicate places a massive bounty on the bear. Joined by his agent and Hu Hu's caretaker, Jackie embarks on a daring quest to outsmart the villains.

programme.title: I Want to be Rich
programme.desc: Young Wah rises from a poverty-stricken background, carrying the heavy burden of caring for his gambling-addicted parents and younger siblings. Against all odds, his resilience and determination to provide a better life for his family eventually lead him to achieve significant success in real estatea testament that perseverance pays off.

programme.title: Hit N Fun
programme.desc: Former Muay Thai legend Zhong Lei trains pro fighters despite his gym's struggles. When ad executive Lin learns her boyfriend is cheating with a champion boxer, she challenges her rival to a match and undergoes brutal training under Zhong. Through the grueling process, Lin's quest for revenge transforms into a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: 8 Bucks Tycoon
programme.desc: When a struggling painter receives a magical wallet that endlessly produces RM8 notes, his life transforms from hardship to luxury. However, is this miracle truly a blessing or a hidden curse?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect's Zhang Chui Shan's son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang's demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang's strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Ming's guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn's beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong's concubine as he knows Dong's adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiance Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets' sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.title: Mirugaa
programme.desc: Forest officials in Kotagiri hunt a man-eating tiger that is attacking innocent people. At the same time, a serial killer is on the prowl for wealthy single women.

programme.title: Vara Pogum 24 Manikkul
programme.desc: Three fugitives barge into a couple's house while escaping the authorities. However, they are flummoxed after finding the wife concealing a murder that has transpired in her home.

programme.title: Irandam Ulagaporin Kadaisi Gundu
programme.desc: Selvam hopes to buy his own lorry and marry his lover Chittu. However, his dreams are disrupted when he ends up with an unexploded bomb.

programme.title: Pathu Thala
programme.desc: An undercover police officer embarks on a mission to capture a crime boss and rescue a politician. However, what he discovers forces him to rethink his views on good and evil.

programme.title: Enakkul Oruvan
programme.desc: Vicky, an insomniac, tries a dream-enhancing pill, only to find his subconscious fantasies bleeding into reality, blurring the lines between dreams and chaos.

programme.title: Ghosty
programme.desc: Police officer, pursuing outlaw who escaped her father's custody 20 years ago, accidentally shoots someone else in a failed shootout.

programme.title: Kappal

programme.title: CROUCHING TIGER, HIDDEN DRAGON
programme.desc: A martial arts film of grand illusion and poetic movement, Ang Lee's Oscar-winning Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon is an epic love story opposed by treachery and lust for power. Chow Yun Fat (Anna And The King) stars as legendary master warrior Li Mu Bai, who hands over his magical sword, Green Destiny, to one-time romantic interest Yu Shu Lien (Michelle Yeoh, Tomorrow Never Dies) for her to deliver to a local governor. But when the jade sword is stolen, suspicion falls on Jade Fox (Cheng Pei Pei), a notorious fugitive who killed Li's master and secretly poses as a scheming attendant to the Governor's pliable daughter, Jen Yu (Zhang Ziyi). Under Jade's influence, Jen rejects a pre-arranged marriage and becomes a cat-like masked warrior who, nonetheless, finds her transition to the shadow world complicated by the appearance of Lo (Chang Chen), a long-lost love. As the quest for recovering Green Destiny features gravity-defying martial arts battles and surreal tableaus of ancient China, the ever-lasting themes of love and trying to conquer evil irrevocably change the lives of Li and Yu, and Jen and Lo.

programme.title: ROOKIE, THE
programme.desc: John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL

programme.title: SUPER MARIO BROS. MOVIE, THE

programme.title: KUNG FU HUSTLE
programme.desc: From Asia's top comedy star Stephen Chow comes Kung Fu Hustle, the highly anticipated follow-up to his smash 2001 hit Shaolin Soccer. Set amid the chaos of pre-revolutionary China, scruffy Sing (Chow) is looking to elevate his status in hopes of joining the sophisticated and ruthless Axe Gang. When Sing attempts to extort money from a local at the crowded apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, his comical attempts at intimidation inadvertently attract the Axe Gang into the conflict. The dilemma finds the inhabitants of the Pig Sty fighting for their lives and unearthing some legendary martial arts masters. Sing now must face his own mortality in order to discover the true nature of the kung fu master.

programme.title: AMERICAN NINJA WARRIOR

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN
programme.desc: Jake (Daniel Gillies) and Tess (Dolly Lewis) investigate the shooting of a trucker when the Vice Squad shows up, demanding they cut their main suspect loose before they compromise one of Vice's investigations. When the same suspect is found dead in the interrogation room, both squads are thrown under suspicion and the station is put into lockdown as the clock starts ticking on Jake and Tess' investigation. The stakes spiral when Jake's life is put into peril and Tess is cut off when the power goes out in Sunny's (Agam Darshi) building Meanwhile, Kye (Ennis Esmer) and Sunny's relationship deepens until Sunny overhears a suspicious phone call.

programme.title: Asian Academy Creative Awards 2025

programme.title: Godzilla Minus One
programme.desc: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in 47 Ronin, an epic fantasy where an outcast joins samurai on a quest for vengeance and honor against a ruthless overlord in ancient Japan.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and family are killed by the infamous and elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessed with revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: Accident, Suicide, Or Murder
programme.desc: A wealthy widow's sudden death perplexes investigators. But with conflicting causes of death and millions at stake, suspicion falls on those closest to her.

programme.title: Accident, Suicide, Or Murder
programme.desc: When a 71-year-old man is found shot dead in a field, investigators suspect his killing is the result of a robbery. But as new evidence surfaces, detectives develop a wild theory to explain his death, and only a voice from the grave can prove it.

programme.title: Accident, Suicide, Or Murder
programme.desc: A woman's sudden death in a Detroit hotel unravels a dark web of secrets, lies, and deadly coincidences that hint at something far more sinister.

programme.title: Accident, Suicide, Or Murder
programme.desc: When a Navy officer succumbs to a mysterious illness after months at sea, nothing makes sense, until an autopsy yields a stunning revelation. All roads lead to dead ends, until they zero in on an unlikely target.

programme.title: Accident, Suicide, Or Murder
programme.desc: A devoted husband, military man, and father of three calls the police with a chilling confession: he's shot his wife. What first appears to be a straightforward homicide soon unravels into something far more complex.

programme.title: Accident, Suicide, Or Murder
programme.desc: A massive changeover rocks the boat. A stew gets pulled in multiple and a flirty love triangle starts to heat up. The chef struggles to cater to vegan guests with particular palates and complaints.

programme.title: Accident, Suicide, Or Murder
programme.desc: What seem like two unrelated events, a truck inferno and a missing persons report, soon collide in a deadly case of mistaken identity.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Cobra Kai
programme.desc: Miguel helps Johnny advertise Cobra Kai on the web. Daniel agrees to chaperon at the Halloween dance so he can keep an eye on his daughter.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands
programme.desc: Doc drags Giulia in his search to understand his past better; Angelo, a patient whose condition forces Martina to prove herself, also has troubles with his past.

programme.title: Fist From Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin warrior battles slave traders to stop his countrymen from being sold into bondage in the gold mines in America.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Identical twins - a musician living in New York, and a mechanic living in Hong Kong - are separated in childhood but are unexpectedly reunited years later when the musician travels to Hong Kong for a concert.

programme.title: The Legend
programme.desc: Martial artists join Red Lotus Flower Society to overthrow evil emperor. Governor hunts society members. Kung fu practitioner falls for merchant's daughter amid kung fu contest for her hand. Gender role reversal comedy ensues.

programme.title: The Legend 2

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Winter in Marakele National Park is one of the scarcest, but also most plentiful, times of the year. See how a giraffe's demise becomes a source of life for the region's vultures, whose survival depends on the decaying flesh of animals like these.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: Find surprises in Mexico's untamed Sierra Gorda biosphere. Prowl the arid semi-desert with horned lizards, marvel at axolotl regeneration in the river-fed foothills, and soar with monarch butterflies in the treetops high above a hazy cloud forest.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: Visit the Monteverde cloud forest, where swirling mists feed Costa Rica's mighty rivers and create a haven for biodiversity. See some of its 750 tree species, hang out with sloths and monkeys, and watch nature heal after decades of deforestation.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Welcome Anna's clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna's scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: New Kids In The Wild
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who's honing her survival skills in Brazil's Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast

While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: After losing their mission materials in quicksand, Tony decides to channel Dom and Blend in to get intel from the people of Rio. Unfortunately it's more difficult than he expected, and Tony and his crew are picked up by a group of favela gangsters in a neighborhood that worships a mysterious young female martyr. The crew is relieved to find that Layla is in charge of the gangsters - until she orders the gangsters to dispose of them!

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline: Mekong Special - Cambodia and Laos
programme.desc: Landline visits South-East Asia where a unique charity in Cambodia gives cows to farmers in return for sending their children to school. In Laos a dairy's buffalo rental scheme is helping lift families out of poverty.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: The multi-award winning Four Corners returns for another year of powerhouse investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, exposing scandals, triggering inquiries, leading debate and holding power to account for 65 years.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the week's journalism.

programme.title: Secret Science - Male Fertility: Part 1
programme.desc: Matt Okine discovers that when it comes to making babies, it's not always easy. He's surprised to learn in the last 40 years, men's sperm count has dropped by 50%. So what men can do to improve that number? (Part 1)

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Interlaken Lodge
programme.desc: Richard and Erin Sims start out building a farm-style lodge, however it balloons into a building of epic proportions, complete with three 'wings', seven-metre-high chimneys, and thousands of hand-picked dolerite stones.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Balwyn, VIC
programme.desc: Paul and Zoe want a garden to match their fabulous art deco home in Melbourne. But project managing the ambitious build themselves will take courage. Loved ones think they're crazy, can they prove the doubters wrong? (Final)

programme.title: Iconic Australia - The Dig
programme.desc: Australia is a mining nation. The digging started when gold was discovered in 185. 170 years later, it is a massively profitable export industry. The challenge is balancing, money, power, culture and the environment.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Five in Fifteen
programme.desc: Adam gives his guests, chefs Gunjan Aylawadi and Nagesh Seethiah, the mission of five dollar per-head dinners in fifteen minutes or less.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: UFC 325: Volkanovski vs. Lopes 2 - Prelims
programme.desc: On Sunday, February 1, UFC returns to Sydney Olympic Park, New South Wales, Australia for UFC 325 which will be headlined by a featherweight championship rematch between titleholder Alexander The Great Volkanovski and challenger Diego Lopes. The duo faced off for the vacant featherweight title last April at UFC 314 in Miami, with Volkanovski earning a unanimous decision victory to reclaim in the throne in the 145-pound weight class.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded - UFC 316: Devalishvili vs O'Malley 2
programme.desc: A championship doubleheader headlines the Octagons return to the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey for UFC 316 on June 7. In the main event, its a highly anticipated rematch when relentless force Merab Dvalishvili defends his bantamweight crown against the man he took it from, Suga Sean OMalley. Plus, the womens bantamweight title is on the line in the co-main event as Julianna Pea faces off with two-time Olympic gold medal winning judoka Kayla Harrison. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 - 1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola - 16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
